description: Challenges the status quo and effects positive organizational change outside of mandated work

signals: Seeks out mentorship to grow their own experience
Eager to learn and grow skillset
examples: Proactively seeks help & guidance from senior engineers

signals: High consistency and reliability in the standard of work
Highly self-motivated and strong attention to detail
examples: Stays up to date with best practices

signals: Strives to be objective and reflects on their own biases when making decisions; accountability for decision and outcomes
examples: Communicate clearly and proactively with the Squad

signals: Strong communication skills and ability to convince Tribe members and Stakeholders
Excellent written and oral interpersonal communication skills
examples: Participates in at least one guild

signals: Help represent DH externally to attract talent --> You are a known and respected contributor in the DH Tech Blog, You speak in meetups/events and represents DH Tech
examples: Leading member in at least one guild
